name: Echo Knight
description: Echo Knights manifest shades of themselves from unrealized timelines to aid in battle.

3.name: Manifest Echo
3.description: Use a bonus action to create a magical echo that you can move and attack from.

3.name: Unleash Incarnation
3.description: When you take the Attack action, make an additional melee attack from your echo's position a number of times equal to your Constitution modifier per long rest.

7.name: Echo Avatar
7.description: Project your consciousness into your echo, allowing it to scout up to 1,000 feet away.

10.name: Shadow Martyr
10.description: Use your reaction to have your echo intercept an attack meant for another creature.

15.name: Reclaim Potential
15.description: When your echo is destroyed, gain temporary hit points.

18.name: Legion of One
18.description: Create two echoes at once and regain an Unleash Incarnation use if you have none when rolling initiative.
